evidence.claim: Clove Health uses AWS services to manage cloud infrastructure, which enhances scalability and performance.
Clove Health implements FHIR standards for data interoperability, allowing EMR systems to communicate effectively.
The company utilizes X12 transaction sets for electronic healthcare transactions, including claims processing.
Integration patterns include both REST APIs and webhook capabilities, facilitating real-time data interactions.
Clove Health discusses utilization of HL7 for integrating health information exchange standards.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on health tech and integration aligns with API automation for X12 transactions.
